articles.description: A lawyer for Apple has told an Australian federal court that Epic Games is trying to change its access to iOS and the App Store in "fundamental and self-serving ways".
articles.content: A lawyer for Apple has told an Australian court that Epic Games is a "self-serving" goliath, in a hearing to determine whether its case can proceed against Apple whilst a parallel US case is running.… [+2304 chars]

articles.title: Zoom Escaper Sabotages Those Annoying Video Calls - Gizmodo Australia
articles.description: An artist has launched Zoom Escaper, a web tool that allows you to ruin your own video calls with visual effects and sound clips.
articles.content:
If you’re dreading another long meeting or end-of-week work drinks conducted over Zoom, a handy new website called Zoom Escaper may be the solution for you.
Last week, industrious artist and educato… [+1816 chars]

articles.title: Dyson's New Air Purifier Destroys Carcinogenic Formaldehyde – channelnews - ChannelNews
articles.description: Dyson, the English tech company known for its extraordinarily innovative air-based technology – vacuum cleaners, hair dryers, hand dryers, fans, heaters – has given its air purifier a mighty update. The name isn’t pretty but there’s a very good reason for it.…
